price: 88. They will abide therein (Hell). Neither will their torment be lightened, nor will it be delayed or postponed (for a while).
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنظَرُونَ
